Name: AIDA64 , URL: /wiki/AIDA64
Notification: Monitoring only available in the Business Edition[2]

Name: Argus Monitor , URL: /wiki/Argus_Monitor
Notification: By window, sound, email, program execution at choosable parameter changes, threshold
Notes: Also shows temperature of CPU, GPU, CPU core speed, Intel Turbo Boost status, CPU power consumption, system load and system fan speeds. Can control speed of GPU and system fans.

Name: Disk Utility , URL: /wiki/Disk_Utility
Notes: Summary information includes one line for S.M.A.R.T.[5]

Name: SpeedFan , URL: /wiki/SpeedFan
Notification: Window, sound, e-mail, running a command; at parameter changes, threshold, temperature
Notes: Estimate health and performance by percentage, and offers online drive analysis (and compares from other users).
